verses.verse: Now <S%G1161><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> went up <S%G305><s%> together <S%G1909><s%> <S%G846><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> temple <S%G2411><s%> at <S%G1909><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> hour <S%G5610><s%> of prayer, <S%G4335><s%> being the <S%G3588><s%> ninth <S%G1766><s%> hour.

And <S%G1161><s%> Peter, <S%G4074><s%> fastening his eyes <S%G816><s%> upon <S%G1519><s%> him <S%G846><s%> with <S%G4862><s%> John, <S%G2491><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> Look <S%G991><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> us. <S%G2248><s%>
And <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G3588><s%> gave heed <S%G1907><s%> unto them, <S%G846><s%> expecting <S%G4328><s%> to receive <S%G2983><s%> something <S%G5100><s%> of <S%G3844><s%> them. <S%G846><s%>

Then <S%G1161><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> Silver <S%G694><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> gold <S%G5553><s%> have <S%G5225><s%> I <S%G3427><s%> none; <S%G3756><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> such <S%G3739><s%> as I have <S%G2192><s%> give <S%G1325><s%> I thee: <S%G4671><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> name <S%G3686><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> of Nazareth <S%G3480><s%> rise up <S%G1453><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> walk. <S%G4043><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he took <S%G4084><s%> him <S%G846><s%> by the <S%G3588><s%> right <S%G1188><s%> hand, <S%G5495><s%> and lifted him up: <S%G1453><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> immediately <S%G3916><s%> his <S%G846><s%> feet <S%G939><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> ankle bones <S%G4974><s%> received strength. <S%G4732><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he leaping up <S%G1814><s%> stood, <S%G2476><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> walked, <S%G4043><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> entered <S%G1525><s%> with <S%G4862><s%> them <S%G846><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> temple, <S%G2411><s%> walking, <S%G4043><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> leaping, <S%G242><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> praising <S%G134><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> people <S%G2992><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> him <S%G846><s%> walking <S%G4043><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> praising <S%G134><s%> God: <S%G2316><s%>

And <S%G5037><s%> they knew <S%G1921><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> it was <S%G2258><s%> he <S%G3778><s%> which sat <S%G2521><s%> for <S%G4314><s%> alms <S%G1654><s%> at <S%G1909><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Beautiful <S%G5611><s%> gate <S%G4439><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> temple: <S%G2411><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they were filled <S%G4130><s%> with wonder <S%G2285><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> amazement <S%G1611><s%> at <S%G1909><s%> that which had happened <S%G4819><s%> unto him. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> as the <S%G3588><s%> lame man <S%G5560><s%> which was healed <S%G2390><s%> held <S%G2902><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> John, <S%G2491><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> people <S%G2992><s%> ran together <S%G4936><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> them <S%G846><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> porch <S%G4745><s%> that is called <S%G2564><s%> Solomon's, <S%G4672><s%> greatly wondering. <S%G1569><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> when Peter <S%G4074><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> it, he answered <S%G611><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> people, <S%G2992><s%> Ye men <S%G435><s%> of Israel, <S%G2475><s%> why <S%G5101><s%> marvel <S%G2296><s%> ye <S%G1909><s%> at this? <S%G5129><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> why <S%G5101><s%> look ye so earnestly <S%G816><s%> on us, <S%G2254><s%> as though <S%G5613><s%> by our own <S%G2398><s%> power <S%G1411><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> holiness <S%G2150><s%> we had made <S%G4160><s%> this man <S%G846><s%> to walk? <S%G4043><s%>

The <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> of Abraham, <S%G11><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of Isaac, <S%G2464><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of Jacob, <S%G2384><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> of our <S%G2257><s%> fathers, <S%G3962><s%> hath glorified <S%G1392><s%> his <S%G848><s%> Son <S%G3816><s%> Jesus; <S%G2424><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> delivered up, <S%G3860><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> denied <S%G720><s%> him <S%G846><s%> in the presence <S%G2596><s%> <S%G4383><s%> of Pilate, <S%G4091><s%> when he <S%G1565><s%> was determined <S%G2919><s%> to let him go. <S%G630><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> denied <S%G720><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Holy One <S%G40><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the Just, <S%G1342><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> desired <S%G154><s%> a <S%G435><s%> murderer <S%G5406><s%> to be granted <S%G5483><s%> unto you; <S%G5213><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> killed <S%G615><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Prince <S%G747><s%> of life, <S%G2222><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> hath raised <S%G1453><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the dead; <S%G3498><s%> whereof <S%G3739><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> are <S%G2070><s%> witnesses. <S%G3144><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> name <S%G3686><s%> through <S%G1909><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> in his <S%G846><s%> name <S%G3686><s%> hath made this man strong, <S%G4732><s%> <S%G5126><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> ye see <S%G2334><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> know: <S%G1492><s%> yea, <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is by <S%G1223><s%> him <S%G846><s%> hath given <S%G1325><s%> him <S%G846><s%> this <S%G5026><s%> perfect soundness <S%G3647><s%> in the presence <S%G561><s%> of you <S%G5216><s%> all. <S%G3956><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> now, <S%G3568><s%> brethren, <S%G80><s%> I wot <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> through <S%G2596><s%> ignorance <S%G52><s%> ye did <S%G4238><s%> it, as <S%G5618><s%> did also <S%G2532><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> rulers. <S%G758><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> those things, <S%G3739><s%> which God <S%G2316><s%> before had showed <S%G4293><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> the mouth <S%G4750><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%> his <S%G846><s%> prophets, <S%G4396><s%> that Christ <S%G5547><s%> should suffer, <S%G3958><s%> he hath so <S%G3779><s%> fulfilled. <S%G4137><s%>

Repent <S%G3340><s%> ye therefore, <S%G3767><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> be converted, <S%G1994><s%> that your <S%G5216><s%> sins <S%G266><s%> may be blotted out, <S%G1813><s%> when <S%G3704><s%> the times <S%G2540><s%> of refreshing <S%G403><s%> shall come <S%G2064><s%> <S%G302><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the presence <S%G4383><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> Lord; <S%G2962><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> he shall send <S%G649><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> which before was preached <S%G4296><s%> unto you: <S%G5213><s%>

Whom <S%G3739><s%> the heaven <S%G3772><s%> must <S%G1163><s%> <S%G3303><s%> receive <S%G1209><s%> until <S%G891><s%> the times <S%G5550><s%> of restitution <S%G605><s%> of all things, <S%G3956><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> hath spoken <S%G2980><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> the mouth <S%G4750><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%> his <S%G848><s%> holy <S%G40><s%> prophets <S%G4396><s%> since the world began. <S%G575><s%> <S%G165><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> Moses <S%G3475><s%> truly <S%G3303><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> fathers, <S%G3962><s%> A prophet <S%G4396><s%> shall the Lord <S%G2962><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> raise up <S%G450><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> brethren, <S%G80><s%> like unto <S%G5613><s%> me; <S%G1691><s%> him <S%G846><s%> shall ye hear <S%G191><s%> in <S%G2596><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> whatsoever <S%G3745><s%> <S%G302><s%> he shall say <S%G2980><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> you. <S%G5209><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> it shall come to pass, <S%G2071><s%> that every <S%G3956><s%> soul, <S%G5590><s%> which <S%G3748><s%> will not <S%G3361><s%> hear <S%G191><s%> <S%G302><s%> that <S%G1565><s%> prophet, <S%G4396><s%> shall be destroyed <S%G1842><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> among the <S%G3588><s%> people. <S%G2992><s%>

Yea, <S%G1161><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> prophets <S%G4396><s%> from <S%G575><s%> Samuel <S%G4545><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> those that follow after, <S%G2517><s%> as many as <S%G3745><s%> have spoken, <S%G2980><s%> have likewise <S%G2532><s%> foretold <S%G4293><s%> of these <S%G5025><s%> days. <S%G2250><s%>

Ye <S%G5210><s%> are <S%G2075><s%> the children <S%G5207><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> prophets, <S%G4396><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> covenant <S%G1242><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> made <S%G1303><s%> with <S%G4314><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> fathers, <S%G3962><s%> saying <S%G3004><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> Abraham, <S%G11><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> in thy <S%G4675><s%> seed <S%G4690><s%> shall all <S%G3956><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> kindreds <S%G3965><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> earth <S%G1093><s%> be blessed. <S%G1757><s%>

Unto you <S%G5213><s%> first <S%G4412><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> having raised up <S%G450><s%> his <S%G848><s%> Son <S%G3816><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> sent <S%G649><s%> him <S%G846><s%> to bless <S%G2127><s%> you, <S%G5209><s%> in turning away <S%G654><s%> every one <S%G1538><s%> of you from <S%G575><s%> his <S%G5216><s%> iniquities. <S%G4189><s%>
